p: Plant samples were collected after 27 days of sowing. The following vegetative growth parameters were recorded after separate root and shoot system: plant heights were measured, fresh weight of shoot and root were measured, and dry weight of shoot and root were also measured after placing them in an oven at 70 Â°C until the weight was constant. Phosphorus, nitrogen, and potassium contents were determined according to the methods described by AOAC International [ 81].
